info.title: U.S. EPA Enforcement and Compliance History Online (ECHO) - Discharge Monitoring Report (DMR) Rest Services
info.description:
Enforcement and Compliance History Online (ECHO) is a tool developed and maintained by EPA's Office of Enforcement and Compliance Assurance for public use. ECHO provides integrated compliance and enforcement information for about 800,000 regulated facilities nationwide.


Additional ECHO Resources: [Web Services](https://echo.epa.gov/tools/web-services), [About ECHO's Data](https://echo.epa.gov/resources/echo-data/about-the-data), [Data Downloads](https://echo.epa.gov/tools/data-downloads).

contact.name: US EPA, OECA Integration, Targeting and Access Branch

license.name: Creative Commons Zero Public Domain Dedication

servers.description: US Environmental Protection Agency OFM Production Server

EFF Exceedances Report Total Exceedance Counts

dmr_rest_services.get_tri_facility_repor.title: TRI Facility Report Top Chemical Pounds
TRI Facility Report Top Chemical TWPE
TRI Facility Report TRI Wastewater Treatment

property.CaseNumber.title: CaseNumber
property.CaseNumber.description: A unique number identifying the enforcement action. For EPA civil cases, these numbers begin with either the two digit EPA Region Code, "HQ" (headquarters initiated cases), and "EF" or "WF" (Eastern or Western Field Office CAA Mobile Source Program cases); followed by the fiscal year in which the action was initiated. After the fiscal year there is a sequence number. State NPDES civil cases start with the two character post abbreviation, followed by a sequence number.

property.ChemicalName.title: ChemicalName
property.ChemicalName.description: The TRI chemical to which the data in this row applies.

property.City.title: City
property.City.description: The name of the city, town, village or other locality, when identifiable, within whose boundaries (the majority of) the facility site is located. This is not always the same as the city used for USPS mail delivery.

property.DocketNumber.title: DocketNumber
property.DocketNumber.description: The number the Clerk of the Court assigned to the case that is filed or to a consent decree when it is lodged. For administrative cases, this number is assigned to the case by the Regional Hearing Clerk.

property.EPARegion.title: EPARegion
property.EPARegion.description: The EPA region in which the facility is located

property.EPARegionCode.title: EPARegionCode
property.EPARegionCode.description: The EPA region where the facility is located. EPA has 10 regional offices that execute programs within several states and territories

property.EndDate.title: End Date
property.EndDate.description: End date for the date range of interest. Formatted as mm/dd/yyyy

property.ExceedencePct.title: ExceedencePct
property.ExceedencePct.description: The percent by which the DMR value (or adjusted value) exceeded its limit (or stay) value, as generated in ICIS-NPDES

property.FacCity.title: FacCity
property.FacCity.description: The city where the facility is located.

property.FacName.title: FacName
property.FacName.example: W M A T A CENTRAL MAINT FAC

property.Latitude.title: Latitude
property.Latitude.description: The latitude of the facility or permit holder as maintained in each data system.

property.LimitUnitDesc.title: LimitUnitDesc
property.LimitUnitDesc.description: The short description of the unit of measure applicable to limit or DMR values

property.Longitude.title: Longitude
property.Longitude.description: The longitude of the facility or permit holder as maintained in each data system

property.Message.title: Message
property.Message.description: Field to record messages (typically performance-related) about packet processing.

property.MonitoringLocationCode.title: MonitoringLocationCode
property.MonitoringLocationCode.description: The code that the monitoring location at which the monitoring requirement (and effluent limit if limited) applies. One parameter may have several monitoring location codes pertaining to the same permitted feature

property.MonitoringPeriodEndDate.title: MonitoringPeriodEndDate
property.MonitoringPeriodEndDate.description: The date that the monitoring period for the values covered by the DMR Form ends

property.NPDESIDs.title: NPDESIDs
property.NPDESIDs.description: Clean Water Act ID from the ICIS-NPDES (Integrated Compliance Information System - National Pollutant Discharge Elimination System)

property.PageNo.title: PageNo
property.PageNo.description: The number of pages of results returned

property.ParameterCode.title: ParameterCode
property.ParameterCode.description: The unique 5 digit numeric code identifying the parameter. If the code is less than 5 digits in the .CSV, append zeros to the beginning of the number (e.g., 100 is equivalent to 00100)

property.ParameterDesc.title: ParameterDesc
property.ParameterDesc.description: The pollutant name and form (e.g., dissolved, suspended) associated with the parameter code

property.PermFeatureNmbr.title: PermFeatureNmbr
property.PermFeatureNmbr.description: A three-character code in ICIS-NPDES that identifies the point of discharge (e.g., outfall) for a facility. A NPDES permit may have multiple points of discharge. If the code is less than three characters in the .CSV, append zeros to the beginning of the number (e.g., 1 is equivalent to 001)

property.Pollutant.title: Pollutant
property.Pollutant.description: The name that EPA has selected as its preferred name for a substance (also known as registry name). If the registry name is not available, use the systematic name instead.

property.PollutantName.title: Pollutant Name
property.PollutantName.description: The name designating the waste material substance or chemical involved at the facility that has a Quantitative Environmental Impact addressed in the SEP or Complying Actions.

property.QueryID.title: QueryID
property.QueryID.description: Sequential number assigned to entire search result

property.StartDate.title: StartDate
property.StartDate.description: Starting date for the date range of interest. Formatted as mm/dd/yyyy

property.State.title: State
property.State.description: The two letter abbreviation that represents the state or state equivalent for the U.S.

property.Year.title: Year
property.Year.description: The calendar year of a time dimension (reporting table) record.

property.Zip.title: Zip
property.Zip.description: US postal ZIP code, as maintained by ICIS.

rb.callback.title: callback
rb.callback.description: JSONP Callback.  For use with JSONP and GEOJSONP output only.  Enter a name of the function in which to wrap the JSON response.

rb.descending.title: descending
rb.descending.description: Output Sort Column Descending Flag.  Enter Y to column identified in the newsort parameter descending.  Enter N to use ascending sort order. Used only when newsort parameter is populated.

rb.download.title: download
rb.download.description: Name of data object to be downloaded, e.g., TopWatersheds, TopSIC, TopFacilities, TopPollutantPounds, TopPollutantTWPE, TopWatershedPounds, TopWatershedTWPE, TopSICPounds, TopSICTWPE, TopFacilityPounds, TopFacilityTWPE.

rb.newsort.DMR.title: newsort
rb.newsort.DMR.description: Output Sort Column.  Enter the number of the column on which the data will be sorted. If unpopulated results will sort on the first column.

rb.output.title: output
rb.output.description:
Output Format Flag.  Enter one of the following keywords:
* JSON = Data model formatted as Javascript Object Notation (default).
* JSONP = Data model formatted as Javascript Object Notation with Padding.  
* XML = Data model formatted as Extensible Markup Language.

rb.p_co.title: p_co
rb.p_co.description: Facility County Filter. Provide a single county name in combination with a state value provided via p_st.

rb.p_ct.title: p_ct
rb.p_ct.description: Facility City Filter. Enter a single case-insensitive city name to filter results.

rb.p_dmr_tri_link.title: p_dmr_tri_link
rb.p_dmr_tri_link.description: DMR facility links to TRI ID Flag. Provide a Y or N to restrict results to DMR facilities that do or do not link to TRI ID(s).

rb.p_dmr_tri_release.title: p_dmr_tri_release
rb.p_dmr_tri_release.description: DMR facility links to TRI ID(s) that reports releases to surface waters flag. Provide Y or N to restrict results to DMR facilities that do or do not link to TRI ID(s) that report releases to surface waters.

rb.p_esa.title: p_esa
rb.p_esa.description: ESA-listed species flag. Provide Y or N to restrict results to DMR facilities that do or do not discharge to counties w/ ESA-listed species

rb.p_exceed.title: p_exceed
rb.p_exceed.description: Effluent limit exceedance flag. Provide Y or N to restrict results to DMR facilities with or with no effluent limit exceedences

rb.p_fname.title: p_fname
rb.p_fname.description: Facility Name Filter. Enter a full or partial facility name to restrict results.

rb.p_huc.title: p_huc
rb.p_huc.description: 2-, 4-, 6-, or 8-character watershed. May contain multiple comma-separated values.

rb.p_imp_poll.title: p_imp_poll
rb.p_imp_poll.description: Discharge pollutants contributing to impairment flag. Provide Y or N to restrict results to DMR facilities that discharge pollutants contributing to a waterbody impairment

rb.p_imp_water.title: p_imp_water
rb.p_imp_water.description: Discharge to impaired waterbodies flag. Provide Y or N to restrict results to DMR facilities that discharge to impaired waterbodies

rb.p_maj.title: p_maj
rb.p_maj.description: Major Facility Flag.  Enter Y to restrict results to Major facilities only.

rb.p_naics.title: p_naics
rb.p_naics.description: North American Industry Classification System Filter. Enter two to six digits to filter results to facilities having matching NAICS codes.  Digits less than six will match to all codes beginning with the provided values.

rb.p_naics2.title: p_naics2
rb.p_naics2.description: North American Industry Classification System Filter. Enter two digit code to filter results to facilities having matching NAICS codes.  A final wild-card is always present allowing "22" to match all NAICS codes beginning with 22.

rb.p_permit_id.title: p_permit_id
rb.p_permit_id.description: Facility identifier from one of the following EPA facility systems: National Pollutant Discharge Elimination System (NPDES) ID, Facility Registry Service (FRS) ID, Toxics Release Inventory (TRI) ID, or Clean Watersheds Needs Survey (CWNS) ID.

rb.p_poll_cat.title: p_poll_cat
rb.p_poll_cat.description:
Pollutant Category. Provide a keyword to limit results.
* NutN = Nitrogen
* NutP = Phosphorus
* ORG = Organic Enrichment
* SS = Solids
* MET = Metals
* PP = Clean Water Act Priority Pollutants
* CER = CERCLA Hazardous Substances
* TRI = TRI Chemicals
* RAD = Radionuclides 
* PAT = Pathogen Indicators
* Temp = Temperature
* WW = Wastewater Flow
* GRAD = General Radioactivity
* CLR = Color
* WET = Whole Effluent Toxicity

rb.p_poll_name.title: p_poll_name
rb.p_poll_name.description: Polltant Name. Provide a single pollutant name to restrict results.

rb.p_potw.title: p_potw
rb.p_potw.description: Publicly-Owned Treatment Works (POTW) Flag. Provide Y to restrict results to POTWs.

rb.p_radius.title: p_radius
rb.p_radius.description: Spatial Search Radius.  Enter a radius up to 100 miles in which to spatially search for facilities.

rb.p_reg.title: p_reg
rb.p_reg.description: EPA Region Filter. Provide a single value of 01 thru 10 to restrict results to a single EPA region.

rb.p_sic.title: p_sic
rb.p_sic.description: Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) Code Filter.  Enter a single 4-digit SIC Code to filter results.  If more complex filtering is required, use p_sic2 and p_sic4.

rb.p_sic2.title: p_sic2
rb.p_sic2.description: Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) Code Filter Alternate 2. Enter a wild-card search against SIC codes.  A final wild-card is always present allowing "22" to match all SIC codes beginning with 22.  Use the "%" character within strings to match any SIC values with the pattern.  For example, "2%21" matches 2021, 2121, 2221, etc.

rb.p_st.title: p_st
rb.p_st.description: Facility State and State-Equivalent Filter.  Provide one or more USPS postal abbreviations for states and state-equivalents to filter results.  Provide multiple values as a comma-delimited list.

rb.p_watershed.title: p_watershed
rb.p_watershed.description: Watershed. Provide a watershed name in combination with p_watershed_group to restrict results.

rb.p_watershed_group.title: p_watershed_group
rb.p_watershed_group.description:
Major U.S. Watershed. Provide one of the following codes to restrict results. 
* M = Major Watersheds
* U = USGS Watersheds
* L = Large Aquatic Ecosystems Program
* N = National Estuaries Program

rb.p_watershed_zip.title: p_watershed_zip
rb.p_watershed_zip.description: 5-Digit Watershed ZIP Code Filter. Provide one or more 5-digit postal zip codes to filter results.  May contain multiple comma-separated values.

rb.p_year.title: p_year
rb.p_year.description: The calendar year for the annual pollutant loadings.

rb.p_year.DMR.title: p_year
rb.p_year.DMR.description: Required.  The calendar year for the DMR annual pollutant loadings.

rb.p_zip.title: p_zip
rb.p_zip.description: 5-Digit ZIP Code Filter. Provide one or more 5-digit postal zip codes to filter results.  May contain multiple comma-separated values.

rb.pageno.title: pageno
rb.pageno.description: Indicates the number of the page to display. It is used only when the results are paginated.

rb.qcolumns.title: qcolumns
rb.qcolumns.description: Used to cutomize service output.  A list of comma-separated column IDs of output objects that will be returned in the service query object or download.  Use the metadata service endpoint for a complete list of Ids and definitions.

rb.responseset.title: responseset
rb.responseset.description: Response Set Limiter. Enter a value to limit the number of records per page. Value cannot exceed 1,000.

dmr_rest_services.get_dmr_loadings.defau.description: Returns a complex object (Water Pollutant Loadings) composed of objects that contain top pollutant loadings organized by geographic location, industry, or facility.

p_year.name: p_year

p_year.DMR.name: p_year
p_year.DMR.description: Required.  The calendar year for the DMR annual pollutant loadings.

p_zip.name: p_zip
p_zip.description: 5-Digit ZIP Code Filter. Provide one or more 5-digit postal zip codes to filter results.  May contain multiple comma-separated values.
